I have experience no side effects.
Comments: My GYN recommended using a pea size amount once a week inserted with your finger and spread around. This area was where I had been experiencing pain and dryness during intercourse.  I'm happy to say that the doesage has really helped. My GYN said less is more when it come to estrogen treatment.

Side Effects: Extreme Headache_ Nausea_ Toxic Feeling
Comments: Horrible Experience with the WORST toxic reaction of my 54 years of life_ after taking this twice. I had an extreme headache with nausea_ which are listed as 'side effects_' but does make them healthy reactions to this so-called medicine. What we are not being told here is that estradiol is a very strong estrogen - AND Carcinogenic. As are the various other chemicals included in this synthetic mix_ i.e: parabens etc.. In addition_ this is seriously big pharma controlled as there is no comparable generic medicine 'allowed' here in the US. ONE tube of this crap costs $240.00 US - ABSURD. The pharmacy I went to lad me that they used to make a comparable compound formula for $40.00_ but they are no longer 'allowed.' ??  Consider ESTRIOL! It's SAFE. Note that Drugs.com will not publish this review.

Side Effects: This stuff worked great until I went to Doctor because I was bent over in  abdominal pain_ joint pain_ couldn't lift my right arm_ jaw pain and high blood pressure_ headaches and forgetfulness. Doctor wanted me to see specialist until I googled the symptoms of this cream and stopped taking it. Much better now_ but looking for a cream for vaginal pain that will work without all these issues:(
Comments: Don't take it

Side Effects: Found that when I did the 1 gm vaginally_ I would get a dizzy sensation.  Using less helped.  But within 3 weeks_ my scalp started itching horribly and my hair started falling out by the handfuls.
Comments: Stopping Estrace_ as I was told by a dermatologist_  did not stop my hair loss.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ loss of appetite_ bloating and abdominal pain_ water retention_ dry eyes_ muscle and joint pain_ and nightmares.
Comments: My gyn recommended Estrace at my one year check up due to acute vaginal dryness and inflammation.  I used it on a Tuesday and then on Thursday.  By Saturday_ my abdomen was so swollen and sore that it felt like I had on a belt that was too tight.  I also had no appetite at all.  My rings were too tight and so were my pants.  I went to see my primary dr on Monday.  He said that the dose was too high and to just use a tiny bit topically once the side effects are gone.  A week after my first dose_ my eyes were so dry that they were throbbing.  I also have severe muscle and joint pain and can't turn my head without it really hurting my neck.  I have had pretty bad nightmares for the past three nights all having to do with babies.  Weird!  I am anxious for this stuff to get out of my system completely.  I guess no sex for me unless using it topically will work.

Side Effects: gained 10lbs and constant headaches_ week after week and I NEVER have headaches
Comments: The side effects are not worth it

Side Effects: No side effects
Comments: I have not experienced any urinary infections or problems.  This has relieved issues with vaginal dryness.  Highly recommend this medication.  It is a bit messy_ but since it is only used twice a week it is worth it.

Side Effects: Blood clot left leg and pulumary embolism

Weight gain from 123 to 128 pounds after first week.  Increased blood pressure immediately and LDL cholesterol over a 3 month period. Everything has always been within normal range until this medicine. My DR says some women cannot take Estrace_ while others tolerate it well.
Noticed vivid dreams since starting the medication.
Comments: Symptoms of dryness have improved.

Side Effects: Vivid dreams (nightmares)_ frequent awakenings_ anxiety_ sleepy all day_bloating (I look pregnant)_ weight gain (14 lbs)in 4 weeks from 105 to 119 lbs. Headaches_ migraines_dry red eyes_brain fog_ visual disturbances_ very dizzy. Flu like symptoms_ increased head pressure. Felt much better on Evamist_ but it was so expensive so I thought I would try these pills instead.  Now switching back to evamist (transdermal spray).
increased depression_ sleeplessness_ anxiety

Reason: To manage PP hormonal side effects
Side Effects: Fever_ chills_ headache_ nausea. I thought I had the flu_ but soon realized the symptoms would come and go_ always beginning about 16 hours after applying Estrace. After 4 doses the correlation was clear. I stopped applying Estrace and symptoms ceased. This was my first experience with any sort of estrogen cream_ so I may just be sensitive to them.
Comments: Told to apply a small amount vaginally to help relieve dryness and lack of elasticity 9 months postpartum (sex painful).
Messy_ has not helped. I had been using Vag-i-fem and found it absolutely effective. Estrace cream is now first-tier coverage for my insurance co. I would not recommend it at all.

Side Effects: cream is a bit messy
Comments: I insert .5mg estrace cream twice weekly. Restores vaginal moisture and may be helping elasticity.

Side Effects: none
Comments: All I needed was 2grams twice a week. It has been a wonderful drug. Non perscriptive vaginal lubricants just didn't work.

Side Effects: None what so ever
Comments: I had a hysterctomy and ovaries removed 3 years ago and have tried everything for hot flashes. They were horrible and nothing worked.  Since I have been taking the medication I feel like I did before the hysterectomy (NORMAL).  It is a wonderful HRT and now hot flash are rare  Also great for returning your sex drive.

Side Effects: No negative side effects
Comments: If you are taking this for vaginal dryness in particular_ I would STRONGLY recommend checking into FemRing_ which is a flexible ring inserted vaginally every three months that delivers a measured dosage of estrogen.  FAR superior to the messy creams!  I would still be on FemRing if my Rx coverage had not stopped covering it.

Side Effects: Some burning at beginning of treatment.  Was less each time I sued the cream.
Comments: I was happy to try this.  I'm not going into menopause.  I had VERY thin tissue in my vulvar area after use of other medications.  This really worked for me.

Side Effects: anxiety
Comments: I have less side affects on this HRT than anything else I have tried.

Side Effects: weight gain.. (water retention)feeling of bloatedness.. other than that it has helped me have a cycle after 3 years of ammenorhea..and also feel like a woman again... although i also had to take it with provera...
Comments: I would recomend it only for those who wish to get there hormones under control..(HRT)

Side Effects: Headaches if I didn't stay to a schedule.
Comments: Helping a lot after trying patches for 3 years. Easy to take with me_ I don't have to worry about patches coming off and it is a lot cheaper than patches.

Side Effects: None at all_ it took a few weeks to kick in for hot flashes etc. Initially a tiny weenie bit of breast tenderness which quickly left.
Comments: I've been on it for 12 years (oral and topical cream form) and absolutely wouldn't trust anything else being it's the natural bio-identical estradiol we produce our whole lives_ as well as the cream totally restored the vaginal tissue using it even only topically.  I love it personally.

Side Effects: none
Comments: This really helped smooth out the perimenopausal symptoms.  What a great alternative to those synthetic hormones (in birth control pills) that had unending side effects!
